events.name: BatchInspectionCompleted
events.description: Marks the completion of an inspection for a specific batch, ensuring quality standards.

events.name: SupplierAuditCompleted
events.description: Indicates that an audit of the supplier's processes has been successfully completed.

events.name: TemperatureExcursionDetected
events.description: Records an instance where temperature deviations occurred during transport.

events.name: EthicalSourcingVerified
events.description: Tracks the verification of ethical sourcing claims for a batch of products.

commands.name: Complete
commands.description: Marks the completion of an inspection for a specific batch, ensuring quality standards.

commands.name: Update
commands.description: Records an instance where temperature deviations occurred during transport.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Supplier Management system for real-time tracking and audits.

integrationPoints.name: QualityControl
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Quality Control systems to automate inspections and audits.

integrationPoints.name: Logistics
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Logistics to track temperature and condition of shipments.
